about_the_game:
How far can you go to earn lots of money? Act quickly and efficiently as a thief who robs houses in a nearby neighborhood will allow you to develop your logical and quick-thinking skills. Get to the property, take as much as you can and manage to escape from the police.

Features:

  • 🎒 The actual load capacity of the backpack and varied stealing methods
  • 🎮 Interesting mini-games during the gameplay
  • 👀 Try to steal as much as possible without being noticed
  • 🎬 Addictive and engaging storyline
  • 🗺️ Non-linear levels that can be passed in many ways
  • 💸 Sell the stolen loot and increase statistics
  • 🚔 Don't let the police catch you


Play the role of a withdrawn man who uses illegal methods to avoid revealing his lies. To earn more money, he decides to break into an inconspicuous house, after which his life will turn 180 degrees. Countless difficulties await you on the road that only the smartest can overcome. Time is running out, be wise and stay undetected!


Have eyes around your head. Housebreaker has mysterious puzzles hidden throughout the map that, when uncovered, can have a tangible impact on your gameplay. You can learn a lot of additional information about your goals that are not directly told in the story.


Enter and explore a new world full of exciting challenges and mini-games. Do your best to complete additional quests, catch as much loot as possible, and not get caught by the susceptible homeowners.


Collect valuable loot during a break-in, which you can later sell, and use the money earned to develop equipment and skills in your hideout. Along with the experience gained, you will be able to buy better tools that will enable break-ins on the most guarded properties.


There is no rule as to the place of action. Initially, they are private houses, gardens, and farms, but as you progress, you will receive orders in areas such as apartments, villas, council buildings, or military and government facilities.

name: Housebreaker Demo
short_description: A break-in action simulator in which methods used plays an essential role. Use reliable equipment for an effective burglary into different locations and complete assignments there, from minor robberies and petty thefts to international jumps.
